text: Ana ana phorga kav anan kurkurigim, ana mba simtɨgi ndi. Ana mba simtɨgi ndim, Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra ndɨkndɨgi vhuuin Zosep ga ndɨɨim, ana mba Idzɨvan ki guman pana phorga nzuaim, ana ana ndɨkndɨga vhuuŋ gangiap, mbaram Zosep ndim guman panan fagim, ana Idzɨp ŋgu garav, vhɨra ana gari guman pana phen gum bigi, ana za nta gari.
